case.name: Mahiru Selfie
case.description: Meia takes a selfie with Mahiru--somewhat reluctantly.

case.name: Mahiru Selfie
case.description: Meia takes a selfie with Mahiru--somewhat reluctantly.

case.name: Butt Pose
case.description: Meia turns around and shows her butt off in a nonchalant fashion.

trigger.state: Well, here I am. Satisfied?
Always expect the worst in your battle plan...
Yes, the carpet matches the drapes...or it would, if I had one.
I was cocky coming into this game...not anymore.
Seeing me like this would get you forty lashes on Tarak.
Shaved is the way to be. One less thing to worry about.
Knowing Jura, she's planned this and has Paiway on the scene...
I hope Paiway isn't lurking around here with her camera...
This'd be one hell of a Pai-check...
Now to get rid of these things. I'm sure you'll appreciate the view...
Enjoy the rear view while you can. I need to find a place to put these...
As you can now clearly see, these shorts were all I had left.
And now my clothes pile is complete...as is your view.
Don't think you've embarrassed me. That suit leaves nothing to the imagination...here, look.
My backside is nothing stimulating, right? Not after you saw it in the suit already.
Well...here I am. All of me.
Best to sate your curiosity now than let it simmer. Here I am from the back...
Considering my wardrobe, my situation has hardly changed at all.
If you think I'm ashamed of my body, you're mistaken...but I am ashamed of losing.
Seems my bare breasts weren't enough to satisfy you. Perhaps my backside is.
Breasts are fetishized on Mejare...butts are usually an afterthought. What about Earth?
I'm fond of the butt...exercise can improve it, unlike breasts.
I'm told the exercising I do has improved my backside. You be the judge...
When my more earnest subordinates finally pipe up about their crushes on me, my butt is usually the subject of her compliments.

case.name: Revy Fight
case.description: Meia gets into a nude fistfight with Revy.

trigger.state: You removed that black eye thing--lemme give it back to ya!
Bitch!
They throw haymakers on your fuckin' rock?
Fuck you!
Welcome to Earth, cunt!
Let's see how many space dykes wanna eat you out after this!
Kiss my ass!
Arrraaaagh!
Hope you don't need a man to save you!

case.name: Jura Dual Masturbation
case.description: Jura takes it upon herself to help Meia's masturbation.

trigger.state: Wha--J-Jura, what are you doing? I--agh! (The crew can't have a pent-up, lonely squadron leader, Meia.)
J-Jura? (It's time you remembered how beautiful you are, Leader.)
Agh! J-Jura! Don't--I-- (It's OK, honey. You deserve to be treated right...)
Jura? I-I--what's the meaning of this? (This is the only way you'll remember what it's like to be loved.)
Ah! Jura, what are you--mm! (If you keep on masturbating alone, you'll forget what having a girlfriend is like.)
Mm! J-Jura--! (Any girl would be lucky to have you, Leader. It's time you remembered how sexy you really are).
J-Jura--! We--you can't! (Sssshh...let's show these Earth people how Mejarians make love. You need it, after all.)
Jura! Don't--what about Barnette? (That's right, I have Barnette. You don't have anyone...that's why you need this.)

markers.marker: Meia speculates that Aella has never masturbated because Earth's culture is less sexual than Mejare.
Meia thinks the crew of the Nirvana should raid San Miguel to claim magic for themselves.
Meia expresses disbelief that Earth women would have anal sex with men--or that men's "tubes" would even fit.
"...My armor deflects lasers. That's about the extent of it."
Meia expresses confusion when other players fail to explain birth control to her.
Meia doesn't know what birth control is.
Meia reacts to a bee bothering Florina.
Meia comments that another player has blue hair.
Meia comments that another player wears a bodysuit like hers.
Meia questions why Captain America, a man, is uncomfortable with nudity.
"Finish me off and I'll tell you."
Meia is forced to listen to Chiaki tell her about Super Mario.
Meia continues to listen to Chiaki tell her about Super Mario.
Meia continues, irritated, to listen to Chiaki tell her about Super Mario.
Meia is forced to listen to Chiaki tell her about Pokemon.
Meia is forced to listen to Chiaki tell her about Samus.
Meia is forced to listen to Chiaki tell her about Street Fighter.
Meia continues to listen to Chiaki tell her about Street Fighter.
Meia has claustrophobia and expresses a hatred of restrained movement.
Meia wants coffee or water instead of alcohol.
Meia is surprised that Corrin, a member of royalty, would treat her comrades as friends even when she hasn't.
Meia misinterprets an Earth country as a whole planet.
Meia rather bluntly observes that another player's skin is dark, and that such is rare on Mejare.
Meia tells Mulan that she is not interested in romantic relationships because she wants to be strictly professional with her crewmates.
Meia responds to Sei's comments about her Dread.
Meia claims she dropped out of school at a young age, living on the streets.
Meia is wary of Mulan's motivations in suggesting her table-wide duel.
Meia asks the table what sights and activities Earth has to offer. (Prompt Marker)
Meia comments that the Earth in her universe is a ravaged mechanical wasteland.
Meia responds to Elaine's late-game offer for a drink.
Meia greets the female player the first time she strips.
Meia relaxes for a moment after masturbating.
Meia tells Futaba that she likes classical music, and that it's relevant because Earthlings composed it.
"These bodysuits can get uncomfortable...although you seem quite comfortable in yours."
"Mejare doesn't have many animals...and I wish it didn't have spiders."
Good to see someone who shares my fashion sense...sort of."
Meia expresses a hatred for anyone affiliated with government or a military.
"My Dread is advanced...nothing about me needs to be."
Meia questions a character's use of honorifics.
After Moon removes her bracelet, Meia will ignore Moon entirely until the latter is about to show her chest.
Meia appreciates Ini's suggestion to visit Hakazura Temple, noting Mejare has little snow.
Meia claims that a character's breasts are probably smaller than Jura's.
Meia claims Jura and Sei would get along.
Meia sees that Jura has finished masturbating...which could lead to interesting developments.
Meia and Jura relax for a moment.
Meia asks the table how long it's been since Earth had monarchies.
Meia asks Kizuna to tell her more about Japan.
Meia asks L'Arachel for more details about her kingdom Rausten.
Meia offhandedly mentions her laser ring early on, or that she is armed with it.
Meia tells Elizabeth that she should not be confined to anyone else's restrictions over her hair.
Meia tells Elizabeth about the first man she ever saw in person.
Meia greets the male player the first time he strips.
Meia rebukes Marinette's French insult.
Meia thinks it's cute how Marinette is timid about saying "bitch."
Meia responds to Marinette's complaints about her distaste for pubic hair.
Meia is offended when Ochako suggests she was engineered.
Meia claims that very few animals exist on Mejare.
Meia questions men's ability to function in coeducational settings.
Meia is surprised to hear that Miko enlists a pharmacist's aid for women to have children.
Meia puts together that Mulan is from Earth, not a separate "China" planet.
Meia questions why Mulan chooses shaving pubic hair as unacceptably unnatural.
After Mulan loses her duel, Meia asks her if she'd be willing to try out as a Dread pilot.
Meia responds to Mulan's question about whether being shaved is rougher on her body.
Meia is confused about Mulan's planetary origins and notes she's only rarely seen snow in person.
Meia doesn't know what "phallic" means.
Meia thanks Nagisa for complimenting her breasts...or at least admits she might be insecure about them.
Meia tells Nami that her dream of mapping out the world is made trivial by satellite technology.
Meia has doubts about Natsuki's recommendation of Singapore, since she's never actually been there.
Meia notes that Navi, a fairy woman, isn't likely to understand how men's penises work anyway.
Meia tells Nayru it's better to have to let go of the past.
Meia returns Nayru's greeting and notes their similar blue hair, yet opposite personalities.
Meia claims to Nayru that she is only playing out of curiosity about men, not to relax.
Meia resents Ochako's implication that women can't fall in love.
Meia mentions her Oma and/or Fama, the women who spliced their eggs together to give birth to her, or expresses confusion with the terms "mother" and "father."
Meia acknowledges that the game has come down to her and one other player.
Meia realizes another character is a pilot and perks up with interest.
Meia tells Pit that she likes fish, and that men on Tarak don't have real food at all.
Meia comments on Pit's apparent feelings towards her masturbating.
Meia questions a woman's choice to have pubic hair.
Meia says she was equally unfriendly to Raven at first.
Meia first reacts to someone masturbating after learning about the rule.
Meia tells Revy that she was surprised, and somewhat dismayed, to discover that men wrote much of Earth's classical music.
Meia tells Revy that it's easier psychologically to kill people when piloting a Dread.
Meia gets into a brief (naked) scuffle with Revy.
Meia mentions that she was wealthy as a child, but lived on the streets as a teenager.
Meia asks with whom Rinkah and Corrin have been in conflict.
Meia isn't sure what Sakura means by the "early '80s" and comments on Mejare's version of history.
Meia doesn't want to spend an entire week in any one Earth location.
Meia expresses disbelief that Earth women might get pregnant unintentionally.
Meia shoots down Sei's offer to jiggle her breasts.
Meia responds to Sei's comments about lasers.
Meia responds to Sei's greeting.
Meia questions how Glitch City got its name.
Meia reacts to Sei telling her to relax.
Meia explains planet Mejare to Sei.
Meia is not impressed with Sei's high-tech armor.
Meia thinks she's better-suited to carrying a child than Sei is.
Meia explains Omas and Famas to Sei.
Meia comments on or questions another character's shyness.
Meia still holds a fighting stance after blocking a punch from Revy.
Meia claims that Mejarian schools are all government propaganda machines.
Meia busies herself early on with work on her electronic tablet.
Meia explains to Twilight was she uses her tablet for.
Meia is first made aware that players have to masturbate upon losing.
Meia rebuffs Veran's requests for submission.
"No, it isn't. Technology is for using, not wearing."
